00028 #include "brisaeventsubscription.h"
00029 
00030 using namespace BrisaUpnp;
00031 
00032 BrisaEventSubscription::BrisaEventSubscription(const QString &sid,
00033         const QStringList &callbackUrls, const int &timeout, QObject *parent) :
00034             BrisaAbstractEventSubscription(sid, callbackUrls, timeout, parent) {
00035 }
00036 
00037 void BrisaEventSubscription::renew(const int &newTimeout) {
00038     this->date = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
00039     this->timeout = newTimeout;
00040 }
00041 
00042 #ifdef USE_NEW_BRISA_WEBSERVER
00043 
00044 HttpResponse BrisaEventSubscription::getAcceptSubscriptionResponse() const {
00045     HttpResponse response(HttpVersion(1, 1), HttpResponse::OK);
00046 
00047     response.setHeader("DATE", QDateTime::currentDateTime().toUTC().toString(
00048             "ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss").toAscii() + " GMT");
00049 
00050     //FIXME: use system information
00051     response.setHeader("SERVER", QByteArray("OS/version") + " UPnP/1.0"
00052                        + QByteArray("product/version"));
00053 
00054     response.setHeader("SID", QByteArray("uuid:") + SID.toUtf8());
00055 
00056     response.setHeader("TIMEOUT", (timeout >= 0) ? QByteArray("Second-")
00057                        + QByteArray::number(timeout) : "infinite");
00058 
00059     return response;
00060 }
00061 
00062 HttpResponse BrisaEventSubscription::getAcceptUnsubscriptionResponse() const {
00063     return HttpResponse(HttpVersion(1, 1), HttpResponse::OK);
00064 }
00065 
00066 #else // !USE_NEW_BRISA_WEBSERVER
00067 
00068 QHttpResponseHeader BrisaEventSubscription::getAcceptSubscriptionResponse() const {
00069     QHttpResponseHeader header(200, "OK");
00070 
00071     header.addValue("DATE", QDateTime::currentDateTime().toUTC().toString(
00072             "ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss") + " GMT");
00073 
00074     //FIXME: use system information
00075     header.addValue("SERVER", QString("OS/version") + QString(" UPnP/1.0 ")
00076             + QString("product/version"));
00077 
00078     header.addValue("SID", QString("uuid:") + this->SID);
00079 
00080     header.addValue("TIMEOUT", (timeout >= 0) ? QString("Second-")
00081             + QString::number(this->timeout) : "infinite");
00082 
00083     return header;
00084 }
00085 
00086 QHttpResponseHeader BrisaEventSubscription::getAcceptUnsubscriptionResponse() const {
00087     return QHttpResponseHeader(200, "OK");
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif // USE_NEW_BRISA_WEBSERVER
